mapper.select: SELECT id AS capabilityId, name AS capabilityName, description AS description FROM _sw_milestone;

SELECT m.id AS capabilityId, m.name AS capabilityName, IFNULL(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN s.snum = #{studentId} THEN r.subitem_id END), 0) AS milestoneCount, IFNULL(COUNT(DISTINCT si.id), 0) AS totalMilestoneCount FROM _sw_milestone m LEFT JOIN _sw_category_milestone cm ON m.id = cm.milestone_id LEFT JOIN _sw_mileage_category c ON cm.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN _sw_mileage_subitem si ON c.id = si.category_id LEFT JOIN _sw_mileage_record r ON si.id = r.subitem_id LEFT JOIN _sw_student s ON r.snum = s.snum GROUP BY m.id, m.name ORDER BY m.id;

SELECT r.semester, IFNULL(COUNT(DISTINCT r.subitem_id), 0) AS userMilestoneCount, IFNULL(( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT si.id) FROM _sw_mileage_subitem si WHERE si.semester = r.semester ), 0) AS totalMilestoneCount FROM _sw_mileage_record r LEFT JOIN _sw_student s ON r.snum = s.snum WHERE s.snum = #{studentId} GROUP BY r.semester ORDER BY r.semester;
